column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Once you can envision it , the technology will follow , though .
#Text=Once you can start seeing it .
#Text=Yeah , there are sites that are sort of attempting it , and if you look right now , there are all these new multiplatform shows , that are beginning to do it .
#Text=And there wo n't be just networking capabilities in these shows ; they 'll be much different than the shows that we see today .
#Text=But on another level , they 'll still be narrative shows .
#Text=A very common thing for a writer is to be riddled with self-doubt , and that can often ruin a lot of inspiration and creativity and make you lose your way in what you 're doing .
#Text=How do you handle a challenge like that ?
#Text=Unfortunately , I ca n't stop myself , whether I 'm having self-doubt or not .
#Text=This new project of mine is a new play by William Shakespeare ; I 've taken lines from all the plays and put them together into a new play , essentially .
#Text=I liked the idea ; I thought it was a cool concept .
#Text=But I did n't know if it was a publishable idea .
#Text=I did n't want to waste my time doing a non-publishable thing , but then I ended up doing it anyway .
#Text=And when I saw it , it was a complete surprise .
#Text=On changing the literary canon
#Text=Do you have a memory that has stuck with you that -- where you continually turn back to it to learn new lessons ?
#Text=I feel like I have a lot of memories that I turn back to all the time .
#Text=Is there one that stands out ?
#Text=Right now , there 's not .
#Text=Although there is a dream I had that 's been sticking with me .
#Text=Memories that I 'm inundated with right now have to do with my childhood , and remembering -- actually , I have a picture of me standing on the West Side Highway when I was a little kid .
#Text=I was just a street urchin , and now my daughter smells like that .
#Text=She smells like a street urchin ?
#Text=She smells like a little kid who runs around in the park , you know ?
#Text=Is a dream too off-base ?
#Text=And that brings back a lot -- the olfactory memories ?
#Text=Yeah , yeah .
#Text=Is a dream too off-base ?
#Text=No , I 'd love to hear your dream .
#Text=So , I was standing in this field -- I think it was a polo ground kind of thing .
#Text=And there were a lot of sort of petite bourgeoisie/intellectuals/professors -- these sorts of people .
#Text=It was late afternoon after some kind of sporting event ; I think it was polo .
#Text=I do n't really know .
#Text=And everyone 's standing around ; it 's the first cooling off of a hot day .
#Text=It did n't really have a time period .
#Text=Sort of recent distant past .
